We have encountered a new problem with the group-max-success-kb feature.
It=
 seems that robots.txt URI is not considered by QuotaEnforcer.
These robots=
.txt are, however, included in the host-report.txt numbers.

Is this planne=
d behaviour?

The robots.txt can be quite large: We have seen robots.txt up=
 to 2.5
Mbytes.
